title: fix corner case in SetItem of Variable
body_html:
x.grad used to be of shape 20, because y[1] was of shape 20. Fix this corner case.

from torch.autograd import Variable
import torch.nn.functional as F
import torch

x = Variable(torch.randn(1, 20), requires_grad=True)
y = Variable(torch.zeros(10, 20))
y[1] = x

y.backward(torch.randn(10, 20))
print(x.grad)
body_text:
x.grad used to be of shape 20, because y[1] was of shape 20. Fix this corner case.
from torch.autograd import Variable
import torch.nn.functional as F
import torch

x = Variable(torch.randn(1, 20), requires_grad=True)
y = Variable(torch.zeros(10, 20))
y[1] = x

y.backward(torch.randn(10, 20))

body:
x.grad used to be of shape 20, because y[1] was of shape 20. Fix this corner case.

```
from torch.autograd import Variable
import torch.nn.functional as F
import torch

x = Variable(torch.randn(1, 20), requires_grad=True)
y = Variable(torch.zeros(10, 20))
y[1] = x

y.backward(torch.randn(10, 20))
print(x.grad)
```
